DataElement.preferredName: Person Health Services Use and Cost Questionnaire Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._Services for the diagnosis and treatment of disease and the maintenance of health._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something._The amount paid, charged, or engaged to be paid, for purchasing goods, services and financial instruments._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
